languages.text: "Есть лишь один путь обретения астропатов — через {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Адептус Администратум{/g}. Если повезет, на корабль будут приписаны свободные астропаты сектора, по той или иной причине оставшиеся без места службы. Если не повезет — запрос уйдет на Терру, и придется ждать. Долго".

traits.locale_text: "Здесь, на окраине Империума, есть только один праведный путь получения новых астропатов — отправка запроса из офиса Адептус Администратум. Если повезет — на корабль будут приписаны свободные в секторе астропаты, по той или иной причине оставшиеся без места службы. Если не повезет — запрос уйдет на Терру и вам придется ждать. Долго."

languages.text: "There is only one way to procure Astropaths, and that is through the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."
languages.original_text: "Есть лишь один путь обретения астропатов — через {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Адептус Администратум{/g}. Если повезет, на корабль будут приписаны свободные астропаты сектора, по той или иной причине оставшиеся без места службы. Если не повезет — запрос уйдет на Терру, и придется ждать. Долго".

traits.locale_text: "There is only one way to procure astropaths, and that is via the Adeptus Administratum. Luck permitting, unattached astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship: ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

"There is only one way to procure astropaths, and that is via the Adeptus Administratum. Luck permitting, unattached astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship: ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. languages.text: «Solo hay una forma de obtener Astrópatas, y es a través del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Con suerte, enviarán a Astrópatas sin asignación del mismo sector a la nave; Astrópatas que hayan perdido su puesto de una forma u otra. De no haber ninguno, la solicitud pasará a Terra y tendremos que esperar. Con mucha paciencia».
languages.original_text: "There is only one way to procure Astropaths, and that is through the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

traits.locale_text: «Solo hay una forma de obtener Astrópatas, y es a través del Adeptus Administratum. Con suerte, enviarán a Astrópatas sin asignación del mismo sector a la nave; Astrópatas que hayan perdido su puesto de una forma u otra. De no haber ninguno, la solicitud pasará a Terra y tendremos que esperar. Con mucha paciencia».

languages.text: 「感応通信官を補充する方法はひとつしかない。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}帝国行政局{/g}に頼むんだよ。運が良ければ、セクターから配属先の決まっていない感応通信官が送られるだろう…何らかの理由で配属先がなくなった者だ。そうでなければ、依頼は地球へと届き待つ羽目になる。うんと長い時間をな」
languages.original_text: "There is only one way to procure Astropaths, and that is through the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

traits.locale_text: 「感応通信官を補充する方法はひとつしかない。帝国行政局に頼むんだよ。運が良ければ、セクターから配属先の決まっていない感応通信官が送られるだろう…何らかの理由で配属先がなくなった者だ。そうでなければ、依頼は地球へと届き待つ羽目になる。うんと長い時間をな」

languages.text: “若要寻找新的星语者，只有一种办法，那就是通过{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}帝国内政部{/g}进行申请。如果运气好的话，内政部会将这片星区尚未分配的星语者指派到船上，也就是那些由于某些原因而失去了工作岗位的人们。如果没有合适的人选，申请就会转发到泰拉那边。如果是这种情况，那我们就只能等了，恐怕会等上很久。”
languages.original_text: "There is only one way to procure Astropaths, and that is through the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

traits.locale_text: “若要寻找新的星语者，只有一种办法，那就是通过帝国内政部进行申请。如果运气好的话，内政部会将这片星区尚未分配的星语者指派到船上，也就是那些由于某些原因而失去了工作岗位的人们。如果没有合适的人选，申请就会转发到泰拉那边。如果是这种情况，那我们就只能等了，恐怕会等上很久。”

languages.text: "Es gibt nur einen Weg, Astropathen zu verpflichten, nämlich über das {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Mit etwas Glück werden Astropathen aus dem Sektor, die im Augenblick ohne Posten sind, dem Schiff zugewiesen. Astropathen, die ihre Dienststelle aus irgendeinem Grund verloren haben. Ansonsten wird die Anfrage nach Terra weitergeleitet und wir müssen warten. Sehr lange."
languages.original_text: "There is only one way to procure Astropaths, and that is through the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt nur einen Weg, Astropathen zu verpflichten, nämlich über das Adeptus Administratum. Mit etwas Glück werden Astropathen aus dem Sektor, die im Augenblick ohne Posten sind, dem Schiff zugewiesen. Astropathen, die ihre Dienststelle aus irgendeinem Grund verloren haben. Ansonsten wird die Anfrage nach Terra weitergeleitet und wir müssen warten. Sehr lange."

languages.text: « Il n'y a qu'un seul moyen de recruter des astropathes, et il faut en passer par l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Avec un peu de chance, des agents en attente d'affectation dans le secteur seront mandatés pour vous servir... des agents qui, pour une raison ou pour une autre, ont perdu leur poste précédent. À défaut, votre demande sera adressée à Terra et nous devrons prendre notre mal en patience. Longtemps, très longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "There is only one way to procure Astropaths, and that is through the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a qu'un seul moyen de recruter des astropathes, et il faut en passer par l'Adeptus Administratum. Avec un peu de chance, des agents en attente d'affectation dans le secteur seront mandatés pour vous servir... des agents qui, pour une raison ou pour une autre, ont perdu leur poste précédent. À défaut, votre demande sera adressée à Terra et nous devrons prendre notre mal en patience. Longtemps, très longtemps. »

« Il n'y a qu'un seul moyen de recruter des astropathes, et il faut en passer par l'Adeptus Administratum. Avec un peu de chance, des agents en attente d'affectation dans le secteur seront mandatés pour vous servir... des agents qui, pour une raison ou pour une autre, ont perdu leur poste précédent. À défaut, votre demande sera adressée à Terra et nous devrons prendre notre mal en patience. Longtemps, très longtemps. »

languages.text: "Astropat edinmenin tek bir yolu vardır ve bu yol da {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}'tan geçer. Şansınız yaver giderse sektördeki görev almamış Astropatlar, gemide göreve getirilir. Bunlar, herhangi bir nedende dolayı hizmet yerleriyle bağı kopan Astropatlardır. Bu başarısız olursa talep, Terra'ya gider ve uzunca bir süre beklememiz gerekir."
languages.original_text: "There is only one way to procure Astropaths, and that is through the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Adeptus Administratum{/g}. Luck permitting, unattached Astropaths from the sector will be posted to the ship — ones who, for whatever reason, have lost their place of service. Failing that, the request will go to Terra and we will have to wait. A long time."
